updates.heading: 2017 CI 11 - Sharing is Caring
updates.message: Fixes and features that keep you happily productive!

updates.heading: Angular and TypeScript
updates.message: Better control over TSLint error levels ensures your project is not overrun by hundreds of linting errors. A critical fix in our quick fix support brings back TypeScript import content assist and quick fix support to all users.

updates.heading: DevStyle Themes
updates.message: Think you've come up with the perfect theme? You can now easily share it with theme shortcodes. Several coloring and scrollbar bugs have been fixed, and for IntelliJ converts, this release also includes the IntelliJ IDEA Dark editor theme!

notifications2.title: Webclipse on Luna!
notifications2.message: We're happy that you are enjoying using Webclipse on Luna and will continue to be able to do so. That said, Eclipse 4.4 aka Luna is not getting any more updates for Webclipse! There are great new versions like Eclipse 4.6 Neon that you should consider upgrading to! Upgrade now to stay up on the latest benefits of Webclipse.

notifications2.title: Webclipse: Limited support on Java 7
notifications2.message: Hey, we noticed that your Eclipse is running on Java 7! While some of our tooling runs on Java 7, most of it will only work with Java 8 or later versions. To continue to benefit from the best of Webclipse, please consider using Java 8 to run Eclipse. We would also recommend using a more recent version of Eclipse for a better user experience.
